name: @ottadev/http-client
description: Simple Promise based HTTP client for browser and node environments.

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): major version release' && npm version major
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): minor version release' && npm version minor
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): patch version release' && npm version patch
